biotools.summary: CNCDatabase(Cornell Non-Coding Cancer driver Database) provides a helpful resource for researchers to explore the pathological role of non-coding alterations and their associations with gene expression in human cancers. This database provides the list of non-coding cancer drivers in gene promoters, enhancers, ncRNAs and CTCF-cohesin insulators published in over 25 studies. It is created from text mining and manual curation to the PubMed articles.
